entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
